QuestData.Title: The Rising Tide
QuestData.Description:
This mainspring wasn't altered by an engineer. These runes on the surface can only have come from a tidesage.
Their aquatic magic is unmistakable. I'd bet whoever did this is also responsible for Addington's death.
Whoever they are, they're likely still nearby. Keep an eye out... they won't be hard to find.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Taelia at Seafarer's Rest, north of Addington Shipyards.
